About Me

Smarter movement starts here—combining technology, science, and heart.

Hi, I’m Dr. Yu-Kuang Wu (PT, PhD), a physical therapist dedicated to integrating hands-on care with smart technology. Since 2016, I’ve been using AI tools and advanced equipment to help people move better, feel better, and quickly identify the root causes of discomfort.

Outside the clinic, I conduct research at Mount Sinai Hospital and the Bronx VA, working to provide better care for people with mobility challenges. Whether you’re dealing with pain or simply want to move and feel your best, I’m here to support you with science-driven, compassionate care.

🤖

Built by a Physical Therapist, Powered by AI

I developed this AI Physical Therapy Chatbot to help you quickly identify muscle and soft tissue concerns, and get clear, effective home exercise suggestions—anytime, without needing an appointment.
